text: So, how is the wine search going?
Hello… I am <font color="936436" bold="1">Julien</font>, I am in charge of the show. Who might you be?
My name is *name*. I'm here to take part in the contest
*name*… You’re Adelaide’s <font color="936436" bold="1">granddaughter</font>?
Yes, that's me!
You know my grandma?
Well... Obviously you <font color="936436" bold="1">can't join</font>. You're not qualified.
But I need to!
What can I do to enter?
Well…. Bring me my favourite <font color="936436" bold="1">wine</font> - Chateau Margaux 1982 - I might reconsider…
But how am I supposed to get it!?
A bribe? You gotta be kidding
Remember, lavender won't freshen up without fruits!
Well well, you actually found my wine! Stunning! Give it to me. Now there are just a <font color="936436" bold="1">few things</font> we have to wrap up.
That’s not all?
What things?
There are some minor <font color="936436" bold="1">preparations</font> left here on set. And you, as a participant, shall also need truffles.
Since you’re so eager to take part in the contest, you need to <font color="936436" bold="1">talk to Monique</font> about these mushrooms. And <font color="936436" bold="1">help me</font>, naturally.
What do I need to do?
How can I help you?

The owner of the <font color="936436" bold="1">lavender fields</font> refuses to water them, unless I get some exotic <font color="936436" bold="1">fruits</font> for his horse. Loony old fool! You get the fruits!
Ok, I’ll help you
Exotic fruits? For a horse? Fine...
Did you get the blanket? Bonbon is freezing!
What do you want? Read the sign, we’re <font color="936436" bold="1">closed</font>.
I did, but... truffles...
I need truffles
Truffles she needs! Bonbon‘s health is my only concern right now. He is terribly, <font color="936436" bold="1">terribly sick</font>. Get out!
Maybe I can help?
What’s wrong with him?
Oh, you really <font color="936436" bold="1">want to help<font>? That is so sweet of you! What did you say your <font color="936436" bold="1">name</font> was?
*name*
*name*, thank you! Could you go and get my little Bonbon a <font color="936436" bold="1">blanket</font>? I’d go myself, but I can’t leave him, I just can’t!
Sure, don’t worry!
I’ll be right back
Get the medicine for Bonbon, quickly!!!
Oh, you have it! Now you’ll be warm, sweet Bonbon! But he is <font color="936436" bold="1">still sick</font>! I don’t know what to do! I’m going to <font color="936436" bold="1">faint</font>, ah!
Please, don’t
We can still help him!
How? Oh, what if he’s <font color="936436" bold="1">dying</font>? What am I gonna do without him! I’ll die too!
No-no, he’ll be alright!
He looks better already, don’t panic!
Maybe… Yes! We should get him some <font color="936436" bold="1">medicine</font>. That will help, I hope. I can only hope now!
Don’t worry, I’ll get the medicine
I’ll be right back
Thinking about taking up my offer? Then get a basket...
Hello *name*! I hear you have some <font color="936436" bold="1">hardship</font> entering the <font color="936436" bold="1">contest</font>. I can help you.
And who are you?
How do you know my name?
Let’s just say, I’m a <font color="936436" bold="1">friend</font> of your granny. But more importantly I hold a certain sway over Julien.
You do?
What would you want for it?
<font color="936436" bold="1">Quid pro quo</font>. You give me things, I give you favors. There are some items you can help me acquire.
Why should I believe you?
Well…
Choice is all yours, *name*. But the first thing I’ll need is a basket
Saw is just a building tool. Nothing shady at all.
Oh, I see you took up my offer, *name*. Well, thank you.
I just hope it’s not a trick
You promised to help
This will really help me. So… let’s see what’s next on my list...
You have a list?
Yes, tell me

We should switch to something more <font color="936436" bold="1">complex</font> or we might get bored. We don’t want that, do we, *name*? Bring me a nice <font color="936436" bold="1">sharp saw</font>.
As you wish
This is getting weird
Are the tables covered already?
Well-well, the horse got the fruits and we got <font color="936436" bold="1">fresh-looking fields</font>. Fine. I guess you can handle simple tasks
I told you I can
Wow, praise from Caesar…
But there's <font color="936436" bold="1">more to do</font>, I hope you understand. You understand, right?
I do
I'm not stupid
I’ll pretend I believe you. The second thing we need is a nice <font color="936436" bold="1">tablecloth</font> set for our guest tables.
I’ll go look for one
You don't even have tablecloths??
Don't forget: fresh fruits and quality wine for our guests!
This tablecloth actually <font color="936436" bold="1">looks good</font>. You have some taste, shocker!
You think very little of me, huh?
Thanks, I guess
But! We need <font color="936436" bold="1">fruits</font> to serve to our <font color="936436" bold="1">guests</font>!
Food is not ready at a food contest...
I suppose we do
Exactly! Go get some tasty <font color="936436" bold="1">fruits</font>. And get some <font color="936436" bold="1">wine</font> to serve too, and please don’t screw this up!
I won’t
Off I go...
Did you get the ingredients? Bonbon is hungry!
Oh, he seems to be <font color="936436" bold="1">feeling better</font>! Thank you so much! What would I have done without you. You <font color="936436" bold="1">saved</font> my baby!
Anyone would do the same!
Aw, shucks…
But I think now that he’s <font color="936436" bold="1">recovering</font>, we should help him get better
What do you mean?
What do we do?..

He needs more <font color="936436" bold="1">nutrients</font>! We need to cook up my special <font color="936436" bold="1">piggy food</font> for him. Would you bring some <font color="936436" bold="1">ingredients</font>?
Of course!
If you say so…
We can't go truffle-hunting without a basket
Bonbon <font color="936436" bold="1">loved</font> the food so much! You’re a treasure, where have been all my life!
Far from here…
It’s nothing really

I think when you came, you mentioned <font color="936436" bold="1">truffles</font>. Did <font color="936436" bold="1">Julien</font> send you? If we want any truffles, we first have to replace my <font color="936436" bold="1">basket</font>
Don't you have one?
Where is yours?
I <font color="936436" bold="1">can't find</font> it anywhere. And, naturally, I can’t go without it..
I’ll go find one
Special basket, eh? Ok…
Are you ready to still my hunger?
Excellent! You see, we make up quite a <font color="936436" bold="1">team</font>
But I still don’t know what we are doing
I’m just in it for your help
Fair enough. Could you bring me some food? <font color="936436" bold="1">Fruit</font>, perhaps?
Why do you need fruit?
Bet it’s for you evil plan as well
I’m offended, *name*. Do you think I <font color="936436" bold="1">don’t eat</font>? An apple a day and all that.
Oh…
I still don’t believe you
Wire and knife, *name*, wire and knife...
These were actually fairly <font color="936436" bold="1">tasty</font>, thank you.
Hm...
I am glad to hear
Now we can proceed with the <font color="936436" bold="1">mill repairs</font>. Oh, I haven't told you about the mill yet, have I?
You haven't
What mill?

The <font color="936436" bold="1">village mill</font>, it is damaged. And I have my reasons to want it <font color="936436" bold="1">back in order</font>. And you'll <font color="936436" bold="1">help me</font>, *name*. As nothing of value comes easy
I see
So I gather…
What I need now is not too taxing, however. Just a few meters of <font color="936436" bold="1">wires</font> and a nice handy <font color="936436" bold="1">knife</font>
“not too taxing” he says…
I’ll do my best
There can be no contest without plates
Fruits and wine in place? <font color="936436" bold="1">Good job</font>! Give me a high five!
I’d rather not
*high five*

<font color="936436" bold="1">What else</font> do we need. Lemme check. Right! A fine <font color="936436" bold="1">set of plates</font> for our participants, you included, to serve up their masterpieces.
I’ll find it
Well, I’ll go look
Bring the garlands, my eyes bleed from the looks of this place!
Well, these plates are actually <font color="936436" bold="1">fancy</font>. I am starting to think there is something in you.
Wow, really?
You took your time...

Now to the <font color="936436" bold="1">cherry on our cake</font> of a competition. We need <font color="936436" bold="1">flower garlands</font> to to <font color="936436" bold="1">decorate</font> this shabby <font color="936436" bold="1">village</font>! Something beautiful!
Garlands?
Where do you get these ideas??
I saw something like that when I was hosting in London. They were simply <font color="936436" bold="1">beautiful</font>! And <font color="936436" bold="1">elegant</font>! We totally need it! Go-go!
Gone, babe!
Be back in no time!
Can you imagine how wonderful Bonbon is going to look in a new costume?
Oh this basket is even <font color="936436" bold="1">better</font> than the one I had! But if we want any truffles, Bonbon should <font color="936436" bold="1">be dressed</font> for the forest.
How can we do that?
What? Dressed?

A <font color="936436" bold="1">new costume</font> is what he needs. Yes-yes, <font color="936436" bold="1">cute</font> and <font color="936436" bold="1">comfortable</font>! Can you bring me one, *name*?
Ok, no problem
Weird is becoming the new normal…
A cute and full picnic basket is exactly what we need in the forest!
This costume is so so <font color="936436" bold="1">cute</font>! And it matches my hiking outfit! <font color="936436" bold="1">Perfect</font>, just perfect!
It was fun to create
Can we talk about truffles now?

Ohoh, truffles! We are coming! Wait! We'll have to <font color="936436" bold="1">eat</font> out there in the forest, right? Could you prepare a <font color="936436" bold="1">picnic basket</font> for us?
Do I have a choice?
Sure!

Oh, what a <font color="936436" bold="1">pretty basket</font> you’ve brought! And you totally got <font color="936436" bold="1">everything we need</font> in it. Now we can go truffle-hunting with my baby Bonbon!
Camera with a tripod, what a simple task, is it not?
You see, the mill is <font color="936436" bold="1">catching the wind</font> again. Be proud, you <font color="936436" bold="1">assisted</font> in something actually important.
Important how?..
I'll believe you here

Now off to something more <font color="936436" bold="1">entertaining</font>! I really need a decent <font color="936436" bold="1">camera</font>. With <font color="936436" bold="1">tripod</font>. Not a challenge for you, right, *name*?
Not at all
You are making these up to taunt me?
Nice, round, white pills...
Hm, you have some <font color="936436" bold="1">technical expertise</font>, *name*. It’d be quite something to know you in private life…
Why do you need those things?
What do you mean?
That really none of your business, *name*. My next request is very much <font color="936436" bold="1">your business</font>, however.
What is it you need?
Ugh, what now?
I need some very specific <font color="936436" bold="1">pills</font>. I wrote the name for you. Please don’t mess it up, *name*.
Got it
Whatever...
Well-well… That was the <font color="936436" bold="1">last item</font> on my list. You did quite well, *name*. <font color="936436" bold="1">Better</font>, than I expected
Will you help me now?
I gave you <font color="936436" bold="1">my word</font>, did I not? I shall speak to Julien and… Persuade him…
You don't have the mic yet? How am I suppose to test it?!

Oh man, these garlands are <font color="936436" bold="1">awesome</font>! Simple and beautiful! I like your idea to use lavender, adds a <font color="936436" bold="1">local vibe</font> and excellent <font color="936436" bold="1">smell</font>!
Thank you!
I did my best given the circumstances
Now the houses are all <font color="936436" bold="1">pretty</font> and <font color="936436" bold="1">decorated</font>! But a litte, almost tiny, <font color="936436" bold="1">problem</font> arose....
What?
Why am I not surpriesed?..

The <font color="936436" bold="1">microphone</font> I planned on using at the competition is dead. I need a <font color="936436" bold="1">new one</font>. Be quick, we have to test it before the event!
Understood!
You should be more careful with your stuff
Can't you even get cutlery ready on time?
Oh good, the new mic. That’s <font color="936436" bold="1">much better</font>. I hope the quality’s good, or there’ll be consequences
Is that all?
Can we get back to the competition now?

No. While you were gone I realized you've <font color="936436" bold="1">only</font> brought the <font color="936436" bold="1">plates</font>. And what about silver <font color="936436" bold="1">cutlery</font>?
But you’ve only asked for plates!
I brought what you asked for

Nonsense! When I say <font color="936436" bold="1">tableware</font> I mean <font color="936436" bold="1">everything</font> one needs to set the table! <font color="936436" bold="1">Forks and knives</font> included.
You said plates, not tableware
How should I know that?
If you don’t understand such <font color="936436" bold="1">simple things</font> there is <font color="936436" bold="1">no place</font> for you at my competition!
Okay, I’ll bring cutlery as well
No need to be rude, I’m going
Let's humiliate the mayor together by sawing his chair short, ha-ha

See, it’s easy if you want it. As I predicted, you <font color="936436" bold="1">amateurs</font> are too <font color="936436" bold="1">slow</font> for gourmet cuisine. But I’ll give you one <font color="936436" bold="1">last chance</font>.
Second chance you mean?
A thousand thanks, I’m sure!
I want the mayor to sit on <font color="936436" bold="1">special chair</font>. After all, HE dragged me to this dump. We shall pay tribute.
And?
What do I have to do with it?
What do you mean? Go get me the chair. And <font color="936436" bold="1">saw it</font> thoroughly!
Got it!
You are so weird
Perfect. We’re gonna <font color="936436" bold="1">rock this town</font>, baby! Seems you’re not that dumb. Forgive my honesty. You’re not easily offended, right? We’re cool?
Right
And the mayor will sit on this <font color="936436" bold="1">short chair</font> and feel terrible, Enjoy the <font color="936436" bold="1">humiliation</font>, dork! Ha-ha
You are cruel
Ha-ha!
Moreover, now this place <font color="936436" bold="1">doesn't hurt my eyes</font> as it used to. And you go, <font color="936436" bold="1">prepare</font> for the contest, it’s gonna be big!
The very last thing I need is a shovel, remember?
So, you have your <font color="936436" bold="1">moment of glory</font> ahead of you, *name*? Let me give you a piece of <font color="936436" bold="1">advice</font>.
What advice?
I am in a hurry
Not so fast, *name*. <font color="936436" bold="1">Quid pro quo</font>, remember?
What do you need now?
Not again…
One last thing. I could really use a <font color="936436" bold="1">shovel</font>.
Yes, of course, I’ll get it
That isn’t  creepy at all...
Thank you, *name*. And my <font color="936436" bold="1">advice</font> is simple: <font color="936436" bold="1">believe no one</font>. Your path will be more tangled than you can possibly imagine.
Um, thanks?..
What, not even you?
Now it’s time for you to fly to the stage, little *name*, fly, fly, fly…
We have to deal with this mustachrophe, quickly!
Hello. I am the manager of this establishment. And you're the new <font color="936436" bold="1">intern</font>?
Yes. My name is *name*
That's me!

Good. Be ready to <font color="936436" bold="1">work hard</font> and do what people tell you to. Only one of our many interns will get the letter of <font color="936436" bold="1">recommendation</font>.
I'll do my best
Count on me
You seem eager, that's a <font color="936436" bold="1">good start</font>. Wait... My <font color="936436" bold="1">mustache</font> is crooked, isn't it?
It looks alright
May be just a little
I knew it! And I don't have my <font color="936436" bold="1">mustache comb</font> on me. Bring me one, that'll be your first task.
Well, ok
If you say so
Is my new cap ready, mademoiselle?
Mademoiselle, come here. I don't recall seeing you here before and <font color="936436" bold="1">I know everyone</font> in my restaurant. I am the <font color="936436" bold="1">Chef</font> after all
I'm the new intern
Apparently you don't
Oh, I recall Gabriel telling me some <font color="936436" bold="1">interns</font> were coming. Are you the one who won that <font color="936436" bold="1">competition</font> in Provence?
Yes that's me
You heard?

Naturally! You seem to be <font color="936436" bold="1">free</font>, so I have <font color="936436" bold="1">a task</font> for you. Get me a new <font color="936436" bold="1">chef's cap</font>, mine's rather dirty.
I'll be right back!
Of course
Wandering around again? Where's the ring?
You, come here. Quickly! You're one of these <font color="936436" bold="1">useless interns</font> Gabriel hires all the time? I can tell by your vacant stare...
Do you need something?
Do you have <font color="936436" bold="1">nothing to do</font>? Why are you wandering around the restaurant? Outrageous! If you're free, go get <font color="936436" bold="1">my ring</font>!
What?
Ring?
Yes! My <font color="936436" bold="1">ring</font>! I don't know where it is, so go find it. Why are you still here? <font color="936436" bold="1">Go!</font>
Going
*leave*
This mess is driving me crazy!
Thank you for helping with my little mustache problem. I'm sorry for making you spend time on my <font color="936436" bold="1">personal requests</font>.
Don't be sorry, it's nothing
I am glad to help
Right, right... I was supposed to give you some <font color="936436" bold="1">papers to sign</font>, but I can't find any in this <font color="936436" bold="1">mess</font>!
Oh..
May be some other time?
Yes. But it would be very helpful if you brought me <font color="936436" bold="1">a box</font> to store all these papers.
Sure
I'll see what I can do
Thanks to you all is in order with the hall decoration
Order is restored! Now we can get back to work. Let me see what we <font color="936436" bold="1">need to do</font> today...
I'm listening

Right. You see, our <font color="936436" bold="1">head waiter</font> is on sick leave. She's <font color="936436" bold="1">pregnant</font>, apparently. Oh, I wish people took family planning more seriously!
That's wonderful
What an inconvenience
Anyway... She's supposed to buy <font color="936436" bold="1">fresh flowers</font> for the tables every morning, but since she isn't here, <font color="936436" bold="1">you</font>'ll be doing that
I'll go get them
I see, I'll be right back
I can't cook without music, it's no fun
I </font>like the cap</font> you've picked, thank you. I see I can count on you
Always
Naturellement!
Since you're proving to be so <font color="936436" bold="1">helpful</font>, I'd like to ask you for help <font color="936436" bold="1">once more</font>. Is that okay? You aren't busy or anything?
Ask away
Well, I can squeeze it into my schedule

Wonderful! Then please get me some <font color="936436" bold="1">new headphones</font>. Just basic ones. Mine are broken, and what's a dinner without a little <font color="936436" bold="1">music</font>!
Of course
Dinner with company is better
I can hear the doggies whining, poot hungry creatures
Très bien! Now I can enjoy my <font color="936436" bold="1">music</font> while cooking. You'll make a great cook, mademoiselle. Thank you
I'm glad to help
You're too kind

Well, there is more I'd like you to do. Maria, our <font color="936436" bold="1">head waitress</font>, she is <font color="936436" bold="1">pregnant</font>, you know, from one of my guys they say, ho-ho
So?
So love is in the air here?

Ho-ho, I've got carried away. She brings me <font color="936436" bold="1">fresh bones</font> every morning, for the <font color="936436" bold="1">strays</font>, you see, and I don't want to leave them <font color="936436" bold="1">hungry</font>...
I got it!
Is one of them called Tramp?
No pan yet? I can't work because you're so slow!
Hm, you <font color="936436" bold="1">found the ring</font>, you say? Do you expect a pat on the head? Don't. You're here to <font color="936436" bold="1">work</font>.
I understand
Not even one pat?
There's more <font color="936436" bold="1">you have to do</font> for me. Go get a <font color="936436" bold="1">new pan</font>. With nonstick coating, a ceramic one. Got it? Now go!
Got it!
I like my shoes like I like my women
This pan will have to do. There is room for <font color="936436" bold="1">improvement</font>, *name*. I'm starting to wonder how you managed to win that competition.
I did my best, that's all
Raw talent it seems
If you say so, but I'm still <font color="936436" bold="1">skeptical</font>.  Enough talking, go get me some <font color="936436" bold="1">shoe wax and brush</font>. In black, if you please.
What? Why?
Black like your heart…
Do I have to <font color="936436" bold="1">explain it again</font>? Just go an do what you are told.
Yes, sir
I hope you can get the best napkins of them all
Thank you for your help. But there is <font color="936436" bold="1">no time to rest</font>, I've just received exciting <font color="936436" bold="1">news</font>, but this means more work for us
What's the news?
Of course it does…
The <font color="936436" bold="1">prime minister</font> himself is going to dine in our humble establishment with his foreign colleagues tonight.
That's amazing!
Oh my...
We need everything to be absolutely <font color="936436" bold="1">perfect</font>. Better than perfect even! I am <font color="936436" bold="1">counting on you</font> to make it happen.
I won't let you down!
Your moustache is already perfect…
Good, good. Then the first thing is preparing a <font color="936436" bold="1">set of napkins</font> embroidered with <font color="936436" bold="1">our symbol</font>.
Sure thing.
That's what I call a challenge!
We shall not miss a single speck of dust!
You've got the napkins? <font color="936436" bold="1">Good job</font>! You're one step closer to your recommendation letter. And to learning the <font color="936436" bold="1">big secret</font> too!
Secret?
I am so excited!
I wish all the interns were as good. Nonetheless, ther's still <font color="936436" bold="1">a lot of work</font> waiting to be done!
What else do you need me to do?
I am all ears

We need to <font color="936436" bold="1">clean</font> everything up. A <font color="936436" bold="1">broom</font> and a <font color="936436" bold="1">feather duster</font> should do. Let's not miss a single speck of dust!
I'll go get 'em
We'll be victorious!
I have to make a very important call, you know
You are incredibly <font color="936436" bold="1">efficient</font>, *name*. Don't forget to include this <font color="936436" bold="1">in your CV</font> if you're ever writing one!
Erm, okay...
Thanks!

But I have to take you off the preparations and ask another <font color="936436" bold="1">personal favor</font>. My <font color="936436" bold="1">phone</font> isn't responding, right when I need it the most!
How can I help?
That's too bad!
I cannot look for a <font color="936436" bold="1">replacement</font> now, I'm too busy, so I place my trust in you, my best intern of the year.
High praise indeed
I'll find you the best phone out there!
The guests are arriving soon, hurry up
This phone is <font color="936436" bold="1">excellent</font>. Thank you. Reliability is the virture of kings as they say…
Thank you
Do they?

Now I can call my friend in the <font color="936436" bold="1">mayor's office</font> and ask them to <font color="936436" bold="1">turn on lights</font> of the the <font color="936436" bold="1">Eiffel tower</font> a few hours earlier for our guests!
Great news!
Good connections you have

Now back to the <font color="936436" bold="1">preparations</font>! We have to think about how <font color="936436" bold="1">everything</font>, you and me included, looks when we greet our esteemed guests
Naturally!
What do you mean?

That means we have to <font color="936436" bold="1">look flawless</font> tonight! And I don't have a <font color="936436" bold="1">tailcoat</font>. Please get me one, if you're not too busy with other errands.
I'll bring it as soon as I can
I'll go see the tailor then
Devil in the detail, remember
Now that I have the tailcoat, it's time to take care of the <font color="936436" bold="1">finer details</font>. The devil is in the details, they say
That's right!
There's a devil in your kitchen too
